sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import "./Policies.css"; function Product() { return (

Privacy Policy


This Privacy Policy administers how Price Crash Deals gathers, manages, maintains, and discloses data collected from users (each, a "User") of the (website address) website ("Site"). This privacy policy refers to the Site and all products and services offered by Price Crash Deals.

Personal classification information


We may collect personal classification information from Users in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, when Users visit our site, subscribe to the newsletter, and in connection with other activities, services, features, or resources we make available on our Site. Users may be asked for, as suitable, name, email address. Users may, however, visit our Site anonymously. We will collect personal classification information from Users only if they intentionally submit such information to us. Users can always refuse to supply personally classification information, besides that it may prevent them from engaging in certain Site related activities.

Non-personal classification information


We may gather non-personal credential information about Users whenever they communicate with our Site. Non-personal classification data may comprise the browser name, the type of computer, and technical data about User's means of contact to our Sites, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers employed and other similar information.

Web browser cookies


Our Site may use "cookies" to improve the User experience. User's web browser stores cookies on their hard drive for record-keeping purposes and sometimes to track information about them. Users may wish to set their web browser to reject cookies or to inform you if cookies are being sent. If they do so, note that some parts of the Site may not operate properly.

How we utilize gathered information



Price Crash Deals may accumulate and use Users personal classification for the following objectives:

- To personalize user experience

We may use information in the gross to learn how our Users as an organization use the services and resources presented on our Site.

- To enhance our Site

We may use feedback you contribute to improving our products and services.

- To run an advertisement, contest, poll, or other Site feature

To send Users information they consented to receive about subjects we think will be of importance to them.

- To send recurrent emails

We may utilize the email address to answer to their queries, questions, and/or other requests. If User decides to opt-in to our mailing list, they will get emails that may include company news, updates, related product or service information, etc. If at any time the User would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, we include detailed unsubscribe instructions at the bottom of each email or the User may contact us via our Site.

How we preserve your data


We adopt proper data gathering, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information, and data stored on our Site.
Delicate and private data transfer between the Site and its Users happens over an SSL guarded communication channel and is encrypted and protected with digital trademarks.

Sharing your personal information


We do not trade, commerce, or rent User's personal classification information to others. We may distribute generic aggregated demographic information not associated with any personal classification information concerning visitors and users with our trade partners, trusted subsidiaries, and promoters for the objectives outlined above.

Third-party websites


Users may find promotion or other content on our Site that link to the sites and services of our partners, suppliers, advertisers, sponsors, licensors, and other third parties. We do not control the content or links that surface on these sites and are not accountable for the systems employed by websites linked to or from our Site. Moreover, these sites or services, including their content and links, may be constantly changing. These sites and services may have their privacy policies and customer service policies. Browsing and interaction on any other website, including websites which have a link to our Site, is subjected to that website's terms and policies.

Advertising


Ads appearing on our site may be conveyed to Users by advertising partners, who may insert cookies. These cookies allow the ad server to recognize your computer each time they send you an online advertisement to compile non-personal identification information about you or others who use your computer. This data allows ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most importance to you. This privacy policy does not entail the use of cookies by any advertisers.

Google Adsense


Some of the ads may be served by Google. Google's use of the DART cookie permits it to serve ads to Users based on their visit to our Site and other sites on the Internet. DART uses "non personally identifiable information" and does NOT track personal information about you, such as your name, email address, physical address, etc. You may opt-out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google ad and content network privacy policy at http://www.google.com/privacy_ads.html

Modifications to this privacy policy


Price Crash Deals has the option to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do, we will post an announcement on the main page of our Site, revise the refreshed date at the bottom of this page. We urge Users to frequently check this page for any modifications to stay informed about how we are assisting to protect the personal information we collect. You recognize and agree that it is your responsibility to examine this privacy policy periodically and become informed of modifications.

Your acceptance of these terms


By using this Site, you signify your approval of this policy. If you do not consent to this policy, please do not use our Site. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes to this policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes.

Contacting us


If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this site, please contact us at:
Price Crash Deals
(PCD Website)
pricecrashdeals@gmail.com
This document was last updated on April 08, 2015


) } export default Product
